title: The Empress Wants To Avoid the Emperor
summary:
Born as an imperial princess, Arnoah was forced to marry the pathetic young king of a small neighboring kingdom. Her older brother became the emperor, so what was she supposed to do? And due to the laws of inheritance, even if her older brother and younger brother were to die, she would still not inherit the throne - rather, her good-for-nothing cheater of a husband would!! Any title she inherits would be vested in her husband in accordance to their marriage contract... that is, until he decides to divorce her because his mistress wants to be the official queen.

“I need to get divorced and become the emperor.”

Her now official ex-husband still doesn't seem to get it, so she decided to finally tell him everything she always wanted to say to his face. When he realized the truth, it was already too late. She spoke to her ex-husband who had his mouth agape.

“I told you to keep your head straight. Didn’t you hear me?”

---
Revenge is sweet. Divorce? Even sweeter.

Arnoa is trapped in a loveless marriage in which she has sacrificed both her heart and dignity. In the midst of such matrimonial misery, she receives the chance to claim the Empire as her own. There's just one catch: she needs a divorce to make it happen! Will she succeed in getting the last laugh?

title: I Don’t Need You Anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: Duke Please Fail!
summary:
I really died after working to death under the Duke of Alterwood.
When I opened my eyes, it was the past, and I vowed to take revenge on the death of overwork.
As long as I'm the caretaker, the duke will die and I'll ruin the unlivable estate!
I spent a lot of money on the wrong budget.

I was going to leave the field to a famous boomer to ruin the farming...

"This is the first time we've had such an amazing harvest, right?""
"Thank you. You saved us!""

Strangely, things keep going well!
And this time, I took revenge on the duke directly.

“Once you touch it, you have to take responsibility.
I need you, Nelly.”

Is this counterproductive? No, I still have to get revenge.
Duke, please screw up!

title: The Guidebook for Villainesses
summary:
Laviore Bailey — the ‘fake saintess’ who banished the innocent princess and stirred up bad blood to wage war.

She’s the villainess with a façade of a saintess.

“I love you. So just shut your mouth and die. Okay?”

But the moment her trusted lover chose her as a sacrifice to the demon, and she realized her father was behind the plan, she killed herself by swallowing poison. It hurt. It was so painful that she could not even scream. But it was fine. Because she knew this was not the end.

“I will save you this time.”

Then, she came back for her second life. She was determined to rescue those who were unlucky because of her and restored her life back.

“You do whatever you want for the man in your dream.” Demian said with a rough smile. 

“I’ll also protect you the way I want to.”

---
Laviore Rea Bailey, the fake saint and heartless puppet of the merciless Prince Sidar, drinks poison on the day the prince is to give her up as an offering to the devil. Instead of dying, she wakes up 10 years in the past. Set on righting her previous wrongs, Laviore vows to save the slave Damian Rhode Drake, whom she had once framed as a spy. As she gets closer to the mysterious Damian, new feelings start to emerge, but will this former villainess truly be able to change her ways?

title: The Best Martial Arts Instructor In The World
summary: The Demonic Cult Leader, Seok Woncho, was a monster who even surpassed the Blood Cult Leader. Do you know who killed him? “Ha Mu-baek.” “But why are you bringing that up…?” “Because he’s coming to our Mengryong Academy as an instructor.” …Damn it. We’re screwed! Ha Mu-baek, the greatest martial artist who crushed both the Demonic Cult and the Blood Cult, is now assigned as an instructor at a martial arts training academy due to a political power struggle. Determined to live quietly while keeping his identity hidden, he soon finds himself solving the problems of cadets with heart-wrenching backstories, disciplining the trashy human scum at the academy, and inexplicably becoming busier by the day… Welcome! It’s your first time meeting a genius lunatic instructor, isn’t it?!

title: The Script-Eating Actor
summary:
"Jaehee, why do you always carry two copies of the script?"
"Well, I might lose one."

That’s a lie.
One is for carrying around on set and showing to others.
The other one is for—

[The drama Youth Train is available for absorption.]
[Would you like to absorb it?]

I use it for eating.
I devour the script and make it completely my own.

The story of Jaehui, an actor who can absorb a script 100%.

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: Murim Login
summary:
Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices, People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time, he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities, he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.  

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC/2384)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11042/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55123)

title: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: Helmut: The Forsaken Child
summary:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!

title: I Stole the Heroine’s First Love
summary:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

title: To the Noble and the Vile You
summary:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
On a Separate Night
summary: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.

title: Baby Snow Leopard of the Black Leopard Family
summary: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by her maternal grandfather, is reborn with memories of her past life. Faced with the same fate, she seeks out her estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, she is instead met with love and acceptance from her father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers her the family leadership.

title: The most poweful characters in the world are crazy about me
summary:
One day, when a thirteen year old was chewing on some bread that came out as a snack, Dahlia Pesteros suddenly remembered her past life. This was the world of the tragic otome game where the characters went crazy, and she was born as the person who would become the greatest villain in the future's younger sister! At this rate, there was no answer. The household would be exterminated, and I would also get my head cut off. That's why I have to get out of this household as fast as possible! 'I have to make him put his guard down and escape!' It was going well up until I got rid of the relative who was aiming for the household, the snake-like Emperor, and got Brother's approval, but-

"I want to dance with Dahlia. What's the problem?"

"Unfortunately, my younger sister is shy."

"I said that I like Dahlia the most!"

Somehow, I've tamed my brother too much, and the strongest characters in the world are obsessed with me!

---
[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80303)

title: Isn’s This Inside the Game?
summary: A guild master, once ranked number one, wakes up 500 years in the future after winning a major siege. The guild is gone, the world feels strange, and everything has fallen apart. Determined to rebuild the guild and adapt to this unfamiliar time, they embark on a journey to restore their legacy and conquer the challenges of the new era.

title: Didn’t We Agree To Have Pure Love?
summary:
When the sadistic heroine travels through time and space to the body of the puppet princess of a fallen nation in a 18+ novel... Can she keep herself unscathed in a den teeming with hungry wolves?

"Wait... Didn't they say this is a pure love story? Why are there so many perverted male protagonists?!"

title: I’m a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed
summary:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
I Become The Youngest Disciple of The Martial Arts Leader
A Villain’s Will to Survive
summary:
Deculein von Grahan-Yukline is the mid-boss of the AAA-grade game REW was developing. A villain who dies 999 times out of 1,000.

One day, Kim Woojin, a game developer for REW, woke up as him.

As a villain, Deculein is inevitably destined to perish.

[Primary Survival Goal: Become necessary to the game.]

If death is his fate, then he will twist fate itself to survive.

title: Regressed Genius Creates Mythic Items
summary:
On the day of the Earth's destruction, Level 1 Alchemist Kim Si-moon forged the Philosopher's Stone, which can do anything if an equivalent exchange is established.

[What do you desire?]

Right now, all he want is to destroy the Earth, to give the man responsible for his brother's death a good kicking, and to live a life without magic! 

He thought he'd ended his life full of regrets... yet he woke up 11 years in the past.

This time, he'll undo his miserable life as a disenchanted person and all the suffering that will happen in the future! 

Follow Si-moon's journey to change the future with his partner, the Philosopher's Stone!

title: Legend of the Reincarnated Demon God
summary:
The Junior Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woon-hwi, was born without a dantian.

However, through dark arts and his shitty personality— er, preternatural ability, he became the junior lord of the Heavenly Demon Cult.

He was a man of many epithets:

‘Great Sorcerer of the Dark Arts’

'King of the Wandering Lost Souls’

But the people’s assessment of him was simple:

“If he smiles, run as fast as you can. His smile is a death sentence.”

“Catch his eye, for he shall provide you with lifelong protection. That is, if you can.”

He was living the good life, when suddenly, he was betrayed in a coup led by the vice-lord and elders of his cult.

“You seem to have forgotten what kind of person I am, Uncle. So die. All of you."

Using the holy relic of the first Heavenly Demon, he self-destructed, taking the traitors with him. And then, he opened his eyes to the most unexpected of places...

"I'm in the Tang Clan? And a branch family at that?"

He awoke as Tang Woon-hwi, an illegitimate son of the Nine Dragon Branch Family, a subset of the Sichuan Tang Clan.

Will Woon-hwi be able to find his master, bring together his scattered followers, and rebuild the Heavenly Demon Cult?

title: Beware of the Strongest Man Who is Crazy About Me
summary: For her sister's happiness and happy ending, Charlotte decides to bring home the knight who holds her sister's heart. However, that means getting to the Black Dragon Order, where the mysterious Archduke Ludovika lurks. With rumors of the archduke's penchant for men, Charlotte dons a wig and becomes Charcharl, a new squire of the order! Despite trying to lay low, she keeps drawing the archduke's eye and suspicions. Can Charcharl keep up the act till the end, or will her cover get blown?

title: I Became the Male Lead’s Adopted Daughter
summary:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.

title: I’m Repaying The Kindness That Raised Me With Obsession
The Revenge of the Abandoned Daughter of a Prestigious Magic Family
summary:
“Lucia, I can't express how thankful I am that you're here.”

The most powerful mage family in the empire, the Rodbell family. And beneath that glorious name lies the family’s disgrace, the half-blood Rodbell.

“I’m really glad you're my daughter.”

I’ve endured all kinds of contempt and worked hard just to hear these words. For my entire life, craving affection, my father smiled for the first time and said to me, “With your lowly body, Rodbell will enjoy its golden age for the next hundred years. Be proud.”

The Abyss (Abyssus), a bottomless pit, so deep and wide that the end is invisible, where the Evil God is sealed. To maintain its power, once every hundred years, Rodbell’s bloodline must be sacrificed there.

‘I can't die like this.’

I couldn’t let my death be used and discarded for them. As they were all distracted, I tried to escape.

‘Goodbye. Foolish, dumb Lucia.’

With an angelic smile and the most dreadful malice, I fell into hell.

──────────

[Something interesting has fallen.]

In the endless darkness, a soft voice filled with laughter approached like salvation.

“I’ll help you.”

With an irresistible sweet proposal.

“How about this time, you make them fall into the abyss?”

──────────

I returned to the past.

I was about to leave after achieving everything I wanted.

“I’ll give Rodbell to you. I’ll give you whatever you desire. So…”

Why you?

The one who hated me the most.

“Don’t leave, Lucia.”

Why are you clinging to me?

title: My Dad Is Too Strong
summary:
What? My elder sister, who is lazy, charming, and abusive, is not born of the same parents as me? What? She wants to be a Superstar, but fortunately, I have a system and a cheat. Help remove all obstacles in her way! What? My parents asked me to help solve her single status problem, but I’m still single! Why don’t you guys care for me? ! The system said: I think the two of you are quite suitable, and I will match you guys up. I won’t do it, As a brother, I will protest against it!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30704)
- [Alternative Raw (IQIYI)](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1hjftkhw59x.html)
- [Alternative English (HoneyToon)](https://honeytoon.com/comic/my-sister-is-a-big-star)

title: Girl with a Knife
summary:
One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)

title: Debut or Die
summary: After a night of drinking, aspiring civil servant Ryu Gunwoo passes out, only to awaken three years in the past in the body of a young man named Park Moondae. Before he can even assess the situation, he's given a mission: Debut or Die! Now, Moondae has one year to debut as an idol or face his doom. Luckily, he's able to snag a spot on the famous survival program "Idol Inc.," but with his skills so low and the competition so high, does Moondae stand a chance at becoming a shining star?

title: Lantern Of The Dawn
summary: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

title: The Obsessive Emperor’s Capable Pharmacist
summary: Hailey is an obscure palace pharmacist in the BL guideverse rofan novel "Ties of Obsession," which is what the reader vaguely recalls upon waking up in her body. Even without Hailey's memories, the new Hailey thwarts the evil head pharmacist's attempt on Emperor Damion's life and is rewarded with the position of his personal pharmacist. Although the contract Damion makes her sign is a lifelong one, it pays a crazy high salary, and her patient's handsome face is a nice perk. What Hailey doesn't foresee is Damion getting attached to her before meeting his gay lover from the original novel!

title: The Villainous Duke’s Pet Bird
summary:
The poignant bluebird of the marriage market, Isabella Eloise, was betrayed by her blindly devoted fiancé of ten years, and lost her place in the social world. The one who found her on a rainy path was none other than the rumored ghost duke.

“Until your feathers grow anew, I shall care for you,” declared the duke.

She thought she had been rescued. But it was only until she discovered his secret…

“Beloved Isabella, I’m curious to hear what sounds you’ll make when I push you to your limits,” the duke mused.

By the time she realized something was terribly wrong, it was already too late to turn back.

“Aedan Holden, you’re insane.”

“Yes, I am. But did you only just figure that out now?”

title: Punishment for a Villainess
summary:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

title: I’m Gonna Annihilate This Land
summary:
Annihilate this land. Cleanse it of all impurities.

“To think I reincarnated as a bald skeleton who can’t even poo.” The Skeleton king, the most wicked demonic king who the gods find bothersome. I was sealed after being scammed by the gods with a contract promising to turn me into a human. This is what they said. “Saint, have you awakened?” This warmth and soft texture… A human body? And I’m a saint? “Oh my, why is the baby saint in such a good mood today?” “Saint, this is the toy of that loathsome skeleton king. Do you want to try destroying it?” “The great gods crossed the line and gave everything back to the skeleton king who challenged the gods.” …Annihilate this land. I will become the saint, make the gods eat shit, and annihilate them.

title: Return of the Frozen Player
summary:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)
---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%87%E5%A4%9C%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%A0%B4%E5%86%B0%E8%80%8C%E5%87%BA/176)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)

title: Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss
summary:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

title: She Is My Mother In Law But I Dont Want Any Conflicts Between us
Don’t Worry, the Baby Pope Has Defeated the Fanatics!
summary:
I woke up inside a dystopian game...
A world with no dreams, no hope, and definitely no mercy.

My assigned mission?
Track down the fanatics and bring peace back to the world.

But...

"How am I supposed to save the world in a three-year-old’s body?!"

The order is on the verge of collapse.
I rescued the pitiful protagonist of the game...
only to somehow end up taking his place.

Now I’m the Pope.
But this place is crawling with fanatics secretly worshiping an evil god, and spies from the royal court.

Even the holy knights who are left... have completely lost it.

"Daddy! Call me Daddy, Master!"
"I told you, I’m the Pope, not Master!"
"You're so cute! You need to eat a hundred meals a day!"
"Shut it."

As both a healer and the Pope, I need someone to play the role of my "Daddy" and protect me.

The problem?
Every single one of my Daddy candidates is completely unhinged.
And even the male lead I let go so he could live a happy life...

"As long as I have you, I don’t care if the world burns."

...seems to have come back not quite right in the head.

Can our crumbling order really survive and bring peace to the world?

Watch the Baby Pope sweat it out to save the world! (CR TL: GS Team)

title: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family
summary:
“Babuba, Babubabubabubabu!?” (Am I going to be a baby!?)

Tot, a legendary assassin in the underworld, was sold by her parents at a young age and was raised strictly as a killer, so she never knew the love of a family she lacked.

Suddenly, she saves a cat and dies, but afterwards she’s destined for hell for taking countless lives.

However, because of one good deed—saving a cat—she's allowed to be reincarnated and is born again as a royal princess, Patricia.

Then, God commands him to save the royal family—her family.

She was supposed to be reborn as a helpless baby, but her assassin skills haven’t faded, and she continues to battle killers one by one.

Gradually, feelings of wanting to protect the royal family members who love each other unconditionally just because they are family...?

title: I’m Ready for Divorce!
summary:
Medi is a runaway former saint who can turn into a wolf and she now lives inside a forest. One day, she took care of a cute young boy who got lost in the woods and helped return him home once the boy started feeling better.

Ten years later, a beautiful young man visited her home saying, "I'm looking for the wolf that had helped me here in the past."

His name is Claude and it seems that he's the boy she had helped before! She can't admit to him that she is the wolf and in her attempt to cover it up, she somehow ended up volunteering to help him look for the wolf instead?!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Palcy](https://palcy.jp/comics/1306), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/7895)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s0651f/)

title: It’s My Destiny To Be The Hero’s Saviour
summary:
I remember the memory of my previous life when I was abused by my father for the experiment. Then I realized. According to my previous life, this is the world of fantasy fiction I’ve read. That she was born with a minor role and died before the novel even started. Ariadne thought calmly, ‘I am screwed.’

She was also screwed on a global basis, this novel has a bad ending. The end of this 10-volume Munchkin (overpowered) fantasy novel is it was the failure of the protagonist and the destruction of the world.

---
After years of torture at the hands of her own father, young elementalist Ariadne Eldier sees her chance to escape when her mother’s untimely death prompts a visit from her grandfather, a powerful archmage. Once whisked away to safety, Aria begins her plans to not only distribute an elixir for the contamination plaguing the land, but also save the protagonist and prevent this novel’s tragic ending. But with her own fated death looming, will Aria be able to become the hero this tale needs?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EA%B5%AC%EC%9B%90%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%A0-%EC%9A%B4%EB%AA%85%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2890), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59494826)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-heros-savior/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26301&contentId=301) (App only)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Heros-Savior/597)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112577)

title: Lady Baby
summary:
"Gloriosa... You ugly thing that can't even bloom a single petal, you'd make perfect food for the trees-."

I was one of thirty-seven children of the Elvador family of the Flower People, and I was sacrificed to the tree that was the foundation of my family. Then, with the help of my betrothed, Arvid, my family was destroyed and I was only saved by my death.

When I woke up, I was transported back in time...? Do I have to relive my horrible past all over again? I wasn’t even saved by dying?! ...If I have to start all over again, I'll save myself in this life-! This is Gloriosa's intense and endearing redemption.

---
Gloriosa Elvador can bloom flowers that produce harmless flames, but her evil brother, Magnus, deems her power worthless and feeds her to the sacred tree. Although she's resigned to die, she reawakens in the past as her 13-year-old self with a second chance at life. Now, she must find her cursed betrothed, Arvid Yultecia. Only he can save her from dying again, and only she can lift his curse. Will their blooming love be enough to save them both, or will Magnus trample their budding romance?
